Weeks.Name: Free
Weeks.Todo: bla bla

Weeks.Name: Testweek
Weeks.Done: Succesfull tested my growbox with all controls for a week
Weeks.Todo:
Read the this README and have fun to grow. Clean everything, also yourself every time before touching anything! Calibrate EC+PH device.

+++Sativa like Amnesia Haze and Sour Diesel+++

If your room temperature will rise above 23°C in the next 3 months, turn on the light at night during flower-time or let the air tubes access fresh air and shut off any heater near by.
The optimal temperatures listed in the Groworganizer is meant for light-time, during night it should be about 5°C colder.

Always water if soil dried out (Finger in 5cm depth should feel dry).
PH always 6,1. (increase: PH-Upper || decrease: PH-Downer).
EC: see Groworganizer (increase: normal water or dung || decrease: dest. water).
Humidity: (increase: wet paper towels or humidifier or low temperature in the growbox || decrease: high temperature or Rotator).

Keep Carbon Filter System always running, play with the rotary switches to handle temperature and vacuum (for the smell).
If you have different seeds, keep in mind to label them from the beginning!

The rotator can always run.

More Information on: 
https://www.zamnesia.com/de/cannabisanbauanleitung
or 
https://www.leafly.com/news/growing

Weeks.Name: Seeds
Weeks.Todo:
Make a paper towel wet, wring it out and put it on top of a pot saucer. Put your 5 seeds on it (never touch with hands), another paper towel on top, another pot saucer on top so it builds a little room for air. You can put this in the growbox without any lights, the seeds like darkness and temperatures between 20 and 30 Celcius, make them wet morning/evening if necessary for about 3 days.
Put every soil block in a glas of water, after 5 minutes empty the glas, grab a little hole about 2cm, take the shell of a seed and put the roots down into the soil, some soil over it, no pressure.

Weeks.Name: Light
Weeks.Todo: Put the light about 30cm above the plants

Weeks.Name: Leaves
Weeks.Done: The 2-3 leafs fill out the glas and you can see the white roots.

Weeks.Name: Airpot
Weeks.Todo:
Prepare an Airpot with soil and a bigger whole, remove the web from the soil block (if you have one) and put the plant into the Airpot, water them from above.
You can water two times a day or every 3 days, overwatering is not possible with Airpots.

Weeks.Name: Little Dung
Weeks.Todo:
Add a little dung.
Keep a fan right on the plants.
Top like here: https://www.growweedeasy.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/5th-set-leaves-plucked-here.jpg

Weeks.Name: Autopot
Weeks.Todo:
Install Autopot system (Clean all, black matt and 5cm clay pebbles on the ground).
Dismantle Airpot, put the plants in Autopot, water also from above the first time.

Weeks.Name: Spike
Weeks.Todo:
Put light every day nearer until burning signs appear.

Create 4 U-shaped spikes (eg. clothes hanger) like this: https://www.growweedeasy.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/u-shaped-spikes-made-of-clothes-hangers-sm.jpg

Gently fold down the 4 mains and spike it to soil like here: https://www.growweedeasy.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/4-hanger-sites-placement-sm.jpg

Weeks.Name: Net
Weeks.Done: Plants fill out 75% of screen or have a height of 30cm.
Weeks.Todo:
Place net 20cm above soil.
Fold branches out and away from the main stem, like a flower opening up or peeling a banana.
If branch is more than 5cm above net, tuck like here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ceLFSWwV3Zc

Weeks.Name: Flower-1.W
Weeks.Todo:
Look for males, install a wood stock for later stability if not using a net.
Calibrate EC+PH device.
Until A Few Weeks into the Flowering Stage, Use Tucking to Keep Plants Growing Horizontally Under the Screen if Bigger5cm above net.

Weeks.Name: Flower-2.W
Weeks.Todo: Keep tucking

Weeks.Name: Flower-3.W
Weeks.Todo: SCROG: Tucking and prune everything under net (Lollipoping)

Weeks.Name: Flower-4.W
Weeks.Todo:
Flower Dung!

If not SCROG: Manicure first 20cm like here:
https://www.leafly.com/news/growing?jwsource=cl

Weeks.Name: Flower-5.W
Weeks.Todo: Stop Tucking, just let gain height.

Weeks.Name: Flower-8.W
Weeks.Todo: Empty AutoPot reservoir with tube, because we will water from above next week.

Weeks.Name: Flower-9.W-flush
Weeks.Todo: Water from above with dest. water (PH checked)

Weeks.Name: Flower-10.W-flush
Weeks.Todo: Water from above with dest. water (PH checked)

Weeks.Name: Cut off
Weeks.Todo:
Do not Water and do not turn light on for 24-72 hours, then cut off like described here:
https://www.leafly.com/news/growing?jwsource=cl

Cut above soil and turn arround the whole net to dry upside down.
Remove only unsticky leafs, all to trash.
Without net, heng the plants one by one with a thread upside down in the box.

Weeks.Name: Finish Dry
Weeks.Todo: Depend e.g. on how hot it was last week

Weeks.Name: Glas-1W
Weeks.Todo:
Now we get the rest of humidity out by putting the weed into the glas like described here:
https://video.leafly.com/m/8lERu5w9/how-to-harvest-your-cannabis-plant-homegrown-episode-105?list=4hMlB0O8

With the leafes make a tincture like described here:
https://www.zamnesia.com/de/blog-stell-deine-eigene-cannabis-tinktur-her-n115
(activate THC by 30min in 115°C, alcohol, freezer)

1L Glas holds about 30g weed and should only be filled 2/3, put your hygrometer device into one to control temperature and humidity, open two times daily for about 30 minutes.

Weeks.Name: Glas-2W
Weeks.Todo: If temperature was under 25 last week, keep on opening at least once/day. Put the tincture through a filter, it's ready to try.

Weeks.Name: Enjoy
Weeks.Todo:
Harden the weed by filling up the glas completely to remove air and put a humidity pack into the glasses, you are done, start a new grow (some only smoke one-year old weed).
But your weed is ready to smoke and gets smoother every week.
